item.description:
Afternoon Round

Let's get in some cross country skiing before we settle in and watch the big game.
The conditions should be great with all the new snow.

We'll meet in the touring center at 1. Depending upon who's there we'll probably split up into groups by ability. I figure we can ski for a hour and half and then meet back at the center for hot chocolate.

Bring beverages and some snacks. And dress in layers.

A day pass at the center costs $11 dollars (cash only). They also rent skis.

Enthousiasts from the morning are welcome to join us!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lunch/wax room next to the pass sale desk

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Super Ski on Super Sunday PM
